Name: Information asset audience
Definition: An attribute of an information asset signifying who it is intended for

Name: Legal professionals
Definition: People who do legal work and have or are seeking to develop some expertise there

Name: Business people
Definition: People who are not seeking to do legal work

Name: External
Definition: People outside this organisation, as well as those inside it

Name: Client
Definition: A specific client, or clients generally
Examples: Legal advice to a particular client

Name: Prospect
Definition: A prospective client, or prospective clients generally
Examples: Pitch contents targeted at a particular prospect

Name: Public
Definition: The world at large, including clients and prospects but also potential team members, media and anyone else
Examples: A website section, newsletter, blogpost or published article
